name: Flappy Galaxy
description: Flappy galaxy is a classic game in a enhanced and futuristic environnement. This game is easy to pick up but hard to master. will you accept the challenge?
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 13 MB available space
